text: Hansie is a 2008 South African biographical drama movie directed by Regardt van den Bergh and starring Frank Rautenbach, Sarah Thompson, Brandon Auret, Rajit Kapoor. ==Other websites== * Category:2008 drama movies Category:2000s biographical movies Category:South African drama movies Category:South African biographical movies Category:Movies set in South Africa Category:Movies directed by Regardt van den Bergh
title: Hansie
